definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: a period of ten days Ge 24:55 (J).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in phr., [[לַחׂדֶשׁ]] ([[עָשׂר]])[[בֶּעָשׂוֹר ]] on the tenth of the month Le 25:9 (H), Ez Eze 20:1, Eze 24:1, Eze 40:1, Ex 12:3, Le 16:29, Le 23:27, Nu 29:7, Jos 4:19 (all P), 2Ki 25:1 = Je 52:4, Je 52:12 (seventh day in ‖ 2Ki 25:8).
of strings of instr.: ´[[נֵבֶל ע]] harp, a ten (-stringed one) Ps 33:2, Ps 144:9; ´[[ע]] alone Ps 92:4 upon a ten (-stringed instrument).
